short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload an image, add a watermark, and download the watermarked image. Add Watermark to unlimited Images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watermark Images is a versatile tool that empowers users with comprehensive features for adding watermarks to their images effortlessly. Here's a detailed breakdown of its key features:

1) Unlimited Free Usage: Enjoy the freedom of using Watermark Images without any restrictions or limitations. Whether you're a casual user or a professional, there are no barriers to access.

2) Unlimited Credits: With Watermark Images, you have unlimited credits to add custom watermark text to as many images as you need. There's no need to worry about running out of credits or purchasing additional ones.

3) Custom Text Watermark: Personalize your images by adding custom text watermarks. Whether it's your name, logo, or any other text, you have the flexibility to tailor the watermark to your preferences.

4) Ad-Free Experience: Say goodbye to annoying advertisements. Watermark Images provides a seamless, ad-free experience, allowing you to focus on your task without distractions.

5) Custom Color: Choose from a wide range of colors to customize your watermark text. Whether you prefer subtle tones or vibrant hues, you can find the perfect color to complement your images.

6) Adjust Transparency: Fine-tune the transparency of your watermark to achieve the desired effect. Whether you want it to be subtle or prominent, you have full control over the transparency settings.

7) Batch Processing: Save time and effort by adding watermarks to multiple images at once. Watermark Images supports batch processing, allowing you to apply the same watermark to multiple images simultaneously.

8) Change Font Style: Explore various font styles to enhance the appearance of your watermark. From elegant scripts to modern sans-serifs, choose the font style that best suits your image.

9) Flexible Positioning: Position your watermark with precision using Watermark Images' flexible positioning options. Whether you prefer it in the corner, center, or any other location, you can easily adjust the position to your liking.

10) Multiple Watermark Rows: Create sophisticated watermark layouts by adding multiple watermark rows to your images. Whether you need them stacked vertically or aligned horizontally, you can customize the layout to meet your requirements.

With Watermark Images, you have all the tools you need to protect and personalize your images effortlessly. Enjoy the freedom, flexibility, and convenience of adding watermarks with ease, backed by a comprehensive set of features tailored to your needs.
